We're moving in the right direction with @NatureHumanBehav requiring open data, but in a case like this we need the raw data before imputation. The data on Github appear to be post-imputation - there's no missing data. 2/2

Hey, @ONtrainandstudy. You have not updated college and university enrolment statistics on the Open Data website in 17 months. You are also well over a year overdue in publishing the latest set of graduate employment statistics.
A) What gives? B) Do better.

I've been visiting more than 100 #opendata portals just in Spain. Finding their APIs and If I were a developer requiring to integrate #opendata from several of them I would turn crazy. I have not a clear and feasible solution, but ignoring the problem is even worse.

@ArturoErdely @RicardoDGPS Les duele mucho haber perdido el control total de la narrativa de la pandemia por el trabajo que hacemos quienes analizamos los datos abiertos de casos y defunciones confirmados.
Por eso nunca abrir√°n los datos de hospitalizaciones y vacunaci√≥n.

@anasharife Tampoco existe un registro/seguimiento especial de menores ahogados por lo que tambi√©n hay que recurrir a informaciones que salen (o no) en medios de comunicaci√≥n. Ya sabes, siglo XXI, datos abiertos, transparencia, la era de la informaci√≥n y tal y tal.
